price: Nígbà náà, wọ́n yíjú síra wọn, wọ́n sì wí pé: “Dájúdájú ẹ̀yin ni alábòsí.”
arabic: فَرَجَعُوٓاْ إِلَىٰٓ أَنفُسِهِمۡ فَقَالُوٓاْ إِنَّكُمۡ أَنتُمُ ٱلظَّٰلِمُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: farajaʿū ilā anfusihim faqālū innakum antumu al-ẓālimūna
